name: WinX YouTube Downloader
short_description:
As a totally free and stand-alone video downloader, WinX YouTube Downloader enables users to free download any videos (such as movies, music, sports, commercials and so on) of resolutions 4096x2160, 3840x2160, 1920x1080, 1080x720 and 640x360 in formats MP4/FLV/WebM/3GP and more  from over 300 online video sharing sites, incl. YouTube, Facebook, Vimeo, Dailymotion, Yahoo! Screen, Vine etc, on Windows (10/8/7/Vista/XP) at a high speed. Equipped with a mini media player, users can preview videos during downloading. 

WinX YouTube Downloader is 100% clean and safe. It is not bundled with any adware and spyware/malware.

For more info: http://www.winxdvd.com/youtube-downloader/

For supported sites by WinX YouTube Downloader: 
http://www.winxdvd.com/youtube-downloader/online-video-sites-list.htm

For downloading and converting videos to AVI, MOV, WMV, MOV or devices, iPhone 6/6 Plus, iPad Air/Mini 2, Samsung Galaxy Note 4/Edge etc:
http://www.winxdvd.com/hd-video-converter-deluxe/
summary: Free Download Online Movies/Music/Videos in 4K/1080P HD
